testcase.name: Game Navigation & Functionality › should open correct GameShell/component for each game
Game Navigation & Functionality › should test 60s timer countdown for Phase 3 games
Game Navigation & Functionality › should test hotkeys functionality
Game Navigation & Functionality › should complete game flow and return to menu
Games Grid Validation › should display exactly 9 game cards
Games Grid Validation › should display all required game keys
Games Grid Validation › should display game card components correctly
Games Grid Validation › should have working "Comenzar" buttons for all games
Games Grid Validation › should display games in responsive grid layout
Gamification Header Testing › should display gamification header elements
Gamification Header Testing › should display XP progress bar correctly
Gamification Header Testing › should display streak counter with flame icon
Gamification Header Testing › should be responsive across screen sizes
Gamification Header Testing › should show tooltips on hover
Gamification Header Testing › should display achievement count if present
Internationalization (i18n) Testing › should display language switcher in header
Internationalization (i18n) Testing › should switch between Spanish and English
Internationalization (i18n) Testing › should persist language selection
Internationalization (i18n) Testing › should translate game titles and descriptions
Internationalization (i18n) Testing › should translate header gamification elements

Stats Panel Testing › should show XP and level information
